item.title: DataBases
item.description: Mongodb Enter mongo shell mongo 192.168.0.25 Start mongodb Upgrade brew upgrade mongodb brew info mongdb ln -s /usr/local/Cellar/mongodb/3.2.4/bin/* /usr/local/bin/ config: /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf, Dont forget touh /usr/local/var/log/mongodb/mongo.log Filename: /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf systemLog: destination: file path: /usr/local/var/log/mongodb/mongo.log logAppend: true storage: dbPath: /Volumes/Home/Walter/mongodb net: bindIp: 192.168.0.99 manual start mongod --config /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf Mac autostart /Library/LaunchDaemons/org.mongo.mongod.plist Filename: /Library/LaunchDaemons/org.mongo.mongod.plist <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1.
